title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Ranger Programs
body: Ranger Programs            Visit the Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial Visitor Center for some of our great Ranger Programs. All programs begin at the Visitor Center. Ranger Talks will be given on the hour from 11 AM to 5 PM Monday thru Thursday. Topics of talks varies; to find out topic of talks for the day of your visit ask in the Visitor Center upon arrival. Black Powder Musket Demonstrations: Friday, Saturday, and Sunday from 11 AM to 5 PM at the top of the hour. Carronade Weekends: On special Weekend, the Perry's Victory staff bring out the big guns. 2015 Carronade Demonstrations: May 23 - 24 June 13 - 14 July 4 - 5 Aug 22 - 23 Sept. 12 - 13
